text: Simone Barontini (born 5 January 1999) is an Italian middle distance runner, who specializes in the 800 metres. He has won six national titles at the senior level. ==Biography== He participated at one edition of the European Athletics Championships in 2018 and one of the European Athletics Indoor Championships in 2019. He finished eighth at the 2019 European U23 Championships. ==National titles== * Italian Athletics Championships ** 800 metres: 2019, 2020 * Italian Athletics Indoor Championships ** 800 metres: 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020 ==References== ==External links== * * Simone Barontini at FIDAL Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Ancona Category:Athletics competitors of Fiamme Azzurre Category:Italian male middle-distance runners Category:Italian Athletics Championships winners
title: Simone Barontini
